data.actual_result: It doesn't work System Specs: Windows 8.1 x64, Canary, Screenshot: http://i.imgur.com/eh9Fzht.gifv
data.short_description: BTTV/Twitch emojis cannot be used as reactions in a read only channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Use a BTTV/Twitch emoji reaction on a read-only channel message
